attributes.action: explain how he can become Prime Minister without being elected to that position. Previously, at least we had known who we were electing to that position. Upon Tony Blair's resignation, the Government should have gone to the Country for re-election with Gordon Brown as Prime Minister. The change over from Blair to Brown is, surely, unconstitutional.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
